snippet: More than 20 years after leaving college because she ran out of money, the writer earned bachelor’s and master’s degrees in psychology.
abstract: Barbara Crowley Preoccupations column shares her experience of interning at age 59 to fulfill an old dream of becoming a licensed mental health counselor; says she hopes to have her own geriatric psychology practice.
lead_paragraph: More than 20 years after leaving college because she ran out of money, the writer earned bachelor’s and master’s degrees in psychology.

headline.print_headline: At Age 59, Interning To Fulfill Old Dream
headline.seo: A Counseling Psychology Internship at Age 59 - Preoccupations
headline.main: At Age 59, Interning to Fulfill Old Dream
